name: Enchantment Sight
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Heroes of the High Court © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text:
Your irises take on a purplish tinge and you can see whether creatures within 60 feet of you are affected by an enchantment effect. To your eyes only, a creature under the effects of an enchantment spell glows with a simple white light around its head. You can immediately discern whether the brightness of the light is faint, moderate, strong, or overwhelming depending on the highest spell level of enchantment currently in effect (as per detect magic). Enchantments of the charm or compulsion subschool glow with a scarlet or emerald hue, respectively.

If a creature under an enchantment effect is in your line of sight, you can attempt a Spellcraft check as a move action to determine the highest-level spell or spell effect (DC = 15 + the spell level, or 15 + 1/2 the caster level for a non-spell effect).

Effects that block divination magic also block this spell.

Enchantment sight can be made permanent with a permanency spell cast by a caster of 9th level or higher, at a cost of 2,500 gp.
text_zh: 你的虹膜呈现略带紫色的色调，并且你可以看离你60呎内，被惑控效果所影响的生物。只有你能看到，一位处在惑控法术效果下的生物，头顶处散发微微的白光。你可以立即分辨这光的亮度是昏暗、中等、强烈、刺目，这取决于当前惑控效果中环级最高的法术(如同侦测魔法)。惑控中的魅惑或胁迫子学派，分别散发猩红色或翠绿色， 如果一名处在惑控效果下的生物在你的视线内，你可以以一个移动动作尝试一次法术辨识检定，来判断最高环的法术或是法术效果(DC=15+该法术环级，非法术效果，DC=15+1/2施法者等级)。 能阻碍预言系魔法的效果也同样会阻碍此法术。惑控视力可以被魔法恒定术恒定，须要由至少9级或更高的施法者，花费2500gp。
